com.estimote.sdk.connection

Interface BeaconConnection.ConnectionCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    BeaconConnection

    public static interface BeaconConnection.ConnectionCallback
    Callback used to indicate state of the connection to the beacon.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAuthenticationError(EstimoteDeviceException exception)
      Invoked when there was a problem with connecting to beacon (authorization failed or Bluetooth connection failed).
      void onAuthorized(BeaconInfo beaconInfo)
      Invoked when Estimote Cloud authorized access to the beacon.
      void onConnected(BeaconInfo beaconInfo)
      Invoked when connection to beacon is established and access is granted.
      void onDisconnected()
      Connection was closed to the beacon.

    • Method Detail

      • onAuthorized

        void onAuthorized(BeaconInfo beaconInfo)
        Invoked when Estimote Cloud authorized access to the beacon. This method is invoked always before onConnected(BeaconInfo).
        Parameters:
        beaconInfo - Beacon's information stored in Estimote Cloud.

      • onConnected

        void onConnected(BeaconInfo beaconInfo)
        Invoked when connection to beacon is established and access is granted.
        Parameters:
        beaconInfo - Beacon's information stored in Estimote Cloud (same as in onAuthorized(BeaconInfo)).

      • onAuthenticationError

        void onAuthenticationError(EstimoteDeviceException exception)
        Invoked when there was a problem with connecting to beacon (authorization failed or Bluetooth connection failed).
        Parameters:
        exception - Exception that occurred.

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected()
        Connection was closed to the beacon. Can happen when beacon is out of range.
